channel.title: Help My Ancients Don't Freeze Or poison, help!
channel.description:
ok, do you know how ice blitz and ice barrage freezes the enemy and poison the enemy... mine doesn't freeze the enemy it just hits them.
please help!

item.title: Help My Ancients Don't Freeze Or poison, help!
item.dc:creator: @Gh0stb4rr4g3 Gh0stb4rr4g3
item.description:
@Gh0stb4rr4g3 wrote:

O.o instead of i telling you , just download a other source , copy & paste the things that not working for you Tongue hope this help's
Wow can't you watch @ the date ?

Read full topic

item.title: Help My Ancients Don't Freeze Or poison, help!
item.dc:creator: @blakdaddy blakdaddy
item.description:
@blakdaddy wrote:

add

castOnPlayer.PoisonPlayer();

right above castOnPlayer.entangle(); castOnPlayer.inCombat();

it will only work if you ahve this void though
(you should have it, do a quick search)

public void PoisonPlayer() { Poisoned = false; PoisonClear = 0; PoisonDelay = 40; Poison = 1; Poison(); }

Read full topic

item.source: Help My Ancients Don't Freeze Or poison, help!

item.title: Help My Ancients Don't Freeze Or poison, help!
item.dc:creator: @blakdaddy blakdaddy
item.description:
@blakdaddy wrote:

thats not what im talking about, but if you have that im sure you have

 public void entangle()

to make without runes try this one

[code]if(spellID == 12871) // ice blitz (lvl 82 spell) { if(playerLevel[6] >= 89) { if((playerHasItemAmount(560, 20)==false) || (playerHasItemAmount(4278, 10)==false) || (playerHasItemAmount(555, 30)==false)) { sendMessage("You do not have enough runes to cast this spell."); sendMessage("You need 20 "+getItemName(560)+", 10 "+getItemName(4278)+" and 30 "+getItemName(555)); } else if((playerHasItemAmount(560, 20)==true) && (playerHasItemAmount(4278, 10)==true) && (playerHasItemAmount(555, 30)==true)) { startAnimation(1978); hitDiff = 6 + misc.random(26); castOnPlayer.EntangleDelay = 500; castOnPlayer.entangle(); castOnPlayer.inCombat(); inCombat(); stillgfx(368, absY, absX); stillgfx(367, castOnPlayer.absY, castOnPlayer.absX); castOnPlayer.sendMessage("You are frozen!"); castOnPlayer.EntangleDelay = 100; PkingDelay = 15; teleportToX = absX; teleportToY = absY; } } else if(playerLevel[6] <= 89) { sendMessage("You need a magic level of 90 to cast this spell."); } }[/code]

Read full topic
item.source: Help My Ancients Don't Freeze Or poison, help!

item.title: Help My Ancients Don't Freeze Or poison, help!
item.dc:creator: @zauruke zauruke
item.description:
@zauruke wrote:

could you make it so i don’t need runes, i would be more grateful[br][size=1]Posted on: July 13, 2007, 06:49:07 PM[/size][hr]if(spellID == 1592) // entangle (lvl 79 spell)
{
if(playerLevel[6] >= 78)
{
stillgfx(179, castOnPlayer.absY, castOnPlayer.absX);
castOnPlayer.entangle();
castOnPlayer.inCombat();
inCombat();
startAnimation(711);
PkingDelay = 40;
teleportToX = absX;
teleportToY = absY;
castOnPlayer.sendMessage(“Entangle has been cast upon you!”);
}
else if(playerLevel[6] <= 78)
{
sendMessage(“You need a magic level of 79 to cast this spell.”);
}

Read full topic

item.title: Help My Ancients Don't Freeze Or poison, help!
item.dc:creator: @blakdaddy blakdaddy
item.description:
@blakdaddy wrote:

if(spellID == 12871) // ice blitz (lvl 82 spell) { if(playerLevel[6] >= 89) { if((playerHasItemAmount(560, 20)==false) || (playerHasItemAmount(4278, 10)==false) || (playerHasItemAmount(555, 30)==false)) { sendMessage("You do not have enough runes to cast this spell."); sendMessage("You need 20 "+getItemName(560)+", 10 "+getItemName(4278)+" and 30 "+getItemName(555)); } else if((playerHasItemAmount(560, 20)==true) && (playerHasItemAmount(4278, 10)==true) && (playerHasItemAmount(555, 30)==true)) { startAnimation(1978); hitDiff = 6 + misc.random(26); castOnPlayer.EntangleDelay = 500; castOnPlayer.entangle(); castOnPlayer.inCombat(); inCombat(); stillgfx(368, absY, absX); stillgfx(367, castOnPlayer.absY, castOnPlayer.absX); castOnPlayer.sendMessage("You are frozen!"); castOnPlayer.EntangleDelay = 100; PkingDelay = 15; deleteItem(560, getItemSlot(560), 20); deleteItem(4278, getItemSlot(4278), 10); deleteItem(555, getItemSlot(555), 30); teleportToX = absX; teleportToY = absY; } } else if(playerLevel[6] <= 89) { sendMessage("You need a magic level of 90 to cast this spell."); } }

copy paste that

or do you need all of them?

actually, do you have the entangle void?

Read full topic

item.title: Help My Ancients Don't Freeze Or poison, help!
item.dc:creator: @zauruke zauruke
item.description:
@zauruke wrote:

karama, i’m not sure if your able to get it any more.[br][size=1]Posted on: July 13, 2007, 06:43:00 PM[/size][hr]this is what they look like:

if(spellID == 12871) // ice blitz (lvl 82 spell)
{
if(playerLevel[6] >= 89)
{
startAnimation(1978);
hitDiff = 6 + misc.random(37);
castOnPlayer.entangle();
castOnPlayer.inCombat();
inCombat();
stillgfx(368, absY, absX);
stillgfx(367, castOnPlayer.absY, castOnPlayer.absX);
castOnPlayer.sendMessage(“You are frozen!”);
PkingDelay = 15;
teleportToX = absX;
teleportToY = absY;

Read full topic
